description: Revert transform of (1 + x - x^2) / (1 + x)^2.
comments: a(n) is the number of ordered trees (A000108) with n edges in which every non-leaf non-root vertex has at most one leaf child. The g.f. A(x) is given by A(x)= x/(1-x B(x)) where B(x)=1+x+2x^2+4x^3+... is the g.f. for A143363. [_David Callan_, Aug 22 2014]
links: Index entries for reversions of series
formula: Given g.f. A(x), then series reversion of B(x) = x + x * A(x) is -B(-x). - _Michael Somos_, Sep 07 2005Given g.f. A(x), then B(x) = x + x * A(x) satisfies B(x) = x + C(x * B(x)) where C(x) is g.f. of A001764 offset 1.
prog: (PARI) {a(n) = if( n<1, 0, polcoeff( serreverse( x * (1 + x - x^2) / (1 + x)^2 + x * O(x^n)), n))} /* _Michael Somos_, Jul 13 2003 */
author: _Olivier GÃ©rard_
